markdownPage.title: Warehouse Solutions
markdownPage.content:
Warehouse Solutions

Responsive Distribution Services

DC /Facility & BPO Operations Mgt

  • Plant/Factory/Hub Logistics Operations

  • Toll Services

    • Bundling/Repacking
    • Co-Man
  • Warehouse Design & Investment
  • Specialized & Variable Multi-User Warehousing
  • Network Analysis & Solutions
  • Import-Export Services

DC /Facility & BPO Operations Mgt

A STATE OF THE ART FACILITY

  • Well maintained distribution center structures aligned with best in class standards of Good Warehousing Practices.

BEST DC PROCESSES

  • From Receiving of finished goods to Storage up to Dispatch to the customers.
  • Order Management, Order Processing to Order Fulfillment and Customer Services.

BPO OPERATIONS MANAGEMENT

  • Back end support to your other Logistics Office requirements.

PLANT/FACTORY/HUB LOGISTICS OPERATIONS

YOUR PLANT / FACTORY ON-SITE PARTNER

  • From Materials Management to Physical Distribution.
  • On-site Logistics.

HUB LOGISTICS

  • Consolidation of RMPM and delivery to the factories through JIT, VMI and general co-locating concepts to save factory space and costs.

TOLL & VALUE-ADDED SERVICES

BUNDLING / REPACKING

  • Provision of any kind of product transformation services in support of your production specifications and Marketing requirements.

CO-MANUFACTURING

  • Conversion of semi-finished Goods to finished goods.
  • Value-Added Services is also integrated into the Management Services Contract to allow synergy and the corresponding cost-efficiency.

WAREHOUSE DESIGN & INVESTMENT

EFFICIENT WAREHOUSES/DC's

  • Through collaborative profiling and other tested warehouse design protocols, we could help design Distribution Center Layout according to the customer's needs
  • We provide efficient warehouse designs using various tools such as Material Flow Simulations, ABC analysis and other tools.
  • Other inclusion - Material handling efficiency initiatives.

  • We facilitate decision as to what's the intelligent business investment move a company could take:

    • Lease
    • Lease to Own Option
    • Owned

SPECIALIZED & VARIABLE MULTI-USER WAREHOUSING

SPECIALIZED WAREHOUSING

We customize storage facility for various kinds of stocks to fit your needs like Temperature controlled environments, High Risk Products, or Hazardous stocks.

VARIABLE MULTI-USER WAREHOUSING

  • A "Pay as you use" concept for your flexibility and business continuity planning.

headings.value: A STATE OF THE ART FACILITY
